info.description: API to create, update and retrieve the details of account sweep services
info.title: Management of Account Sweeps

get.description: Retrieves the list of account links for a sweep to occur.

parameters.name: toAccountId
parameters.description: Account number of the Payee or Beneficiary of the transaction

parameters.name: fromAccountId
parameters.description: For surplus this refers to the account which will be credited and for maintenance this account from where the funds are debited.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.description: Retrieves the list of cancelled sweeps

parameters.name: sweepId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Retail account sweep

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

code.description: The code related to override message.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

fromAccountDetails.description: Debit account details for sweep record

fromAccountId.description: For surplus this refers to the account which will be credited and for maintenance this account from where the funds are debited.

fromAccountCurrency.description: Is the currency of the account which funds will be transferred from.

toAccountId.description: Account number of the Payee or Beneficiary of the transaction

toAccountCurrency.description: For Surplus sweep this refers to the account which will be debited and funds moved out. For maintenance sweep, this will be the account where funds are credited to maintain the account.

maximumRequiredBalance.description: Maximum required balance details for sweep record

minimumRequiredBalance.description: Maximum required balance details for sweep record

overrides.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

override.description: The override message is captured  that was generated at the time of commitment of the transaction to the database.

sweepType.description: Sweep types defined to the user

frequency.description: Specifies the frequency in which the payment application(periodic payments) execute the payment instruction.

nextRunDate.description: Contains bank date on which the job is to be next run

recordStatus.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
